byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Morgan Stanley has formed a new team that aims to advise banks on capital issues while also providing debt and equity underwriting services, as European institutions continue to face pressure.
snippet: Morgan Stanley has formed a new team that aims to advise banks on capital issues while also providing debt and equity underwriting services, as European institutions continue to face pressure.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley has formed a new team focused on advising banks worldwide on capital and financing issues, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Forms New Bank Advisory Team
